title: Vegan Cream Cheese
directions: Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Add water until desired consistency is reached, if necessary. Dress this vegan cream cheese up with optional flavors. Optional cream vegan cream cheese flavors include: Strawberry, lemon zest and dill, garlic and chive, pumpkin, olive, garden vegetable
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups raw cashews, soaked, rinsed and drained
